xxl.core.math.functions
Interface Differentiable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BiweightKernel, CosineArchKernel, DifferenceKernelEstimator, GaussianKernel, TransformedKernelFunction, TriweightKernel
public interface Differentiable

Classes implementing this interface are either analytically or numerically differentiable, i.e., the first derivative or an approximation of it can be computed by calling the method derivative. The derivative is returned as a real-valued function.

See Also:
RealFunction, RealFunctionArea

Method Summary
 RealFunction derivative()
          Returns the first derivative of the implementing class as a real-valued function.
 

Method Detail

derivative

RealFunction derivative()
Returns the first derivative of the implementing class as a real-valued function.

Returns:
first derivative as RealFunction
